meanings.definition: Attracting attention by being flashy or ostentatious.
meanings.sent1: The peacock's feathers were very showy.
meanings.sent2: She wore a showy dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The showy car drew everyone's eyes as it zoomed by.
meanings.sent4: The showy display of fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The showy jewelry sparkled under the bright lights.

meanings.definition: Displaying a lot of bright colors or decorations.
meanings.sent1: The showy flowers bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The showy painting brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The showy birthday cake was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The showy Christmas tree shimmered with ornaments.
meanings.sent5: The showy costume stood out on the stage.

meanings.definition: Tending to show off or boast.
meanings.sent1: His showy behavior annoyed his friends.
meanings.sent2: She always wore showy accessories to flaunt her style.
meanings.sent3: The showy athlete bragged about his achievements.
meanings.sent4: The showy singer boasted about her upcoming concert.
meanings.sent5: The showy peacock strutted around, displaying its feathers proudly.
